content: Not all of the Frozen Corpses you'll find along this path will come alive, but those that do hold either spiked maces or very long blades, and will slowly swat at you or do leaping attacks with them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path'.
The content is as follows:
Not all of the Frozen Corpses you'll find along this path will come alive, but those that do hold either spiked maces or very long blades, and will slowly swat at you or do leaping attacks with them.
